alert.note: Alert for Loup Rivers Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 8:05PM CDT until April 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS LIKELY SATURDAY AFTERNOON/EARLY EVENING IN PORTIONS OF CENTRAL, NORTH CENTRAL AND THE EASTERN NEBRASKA SANDHILLS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND WIND FOR THE LOUP RIVERS BASIN... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 209 Loup Rivers Basin. * TIMING...From 1 PM CT (Noon MT) through 8 PM CT (7 PM MT) Friday and from noon CT through 8 PM CT Saturday. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 13 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 50s. * IMPACTS...Any fires which may develop, have a high probability for rapid spread and will be difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
